item.title: Proxy traffic
item.description: Proxy traffic with Secondary DNS overrideWhen you set up incoming zone transfers on a secondary zone, you cannot enable the proxy on any transferred DNS records by default. With Secondary DNS override, you can use Cloudflare as your secondary DNS provider but still get the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare’s proxy. Additionally it lets you override any A and AAAA records on your zone apex with a CNAME record.
